channel.title: Blogs on TheBlackTechie
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on TheBlackTechie

item.title: No Header
item.description: Feeling Responsive allows you to use all kinds of headers. This example shows no header at all. Just the navigation

item.title: No Header but Article Image
item.description: Feeling Responsive enables you to get the attention of visitors. If you don’t want to use a big header, use an image for the article instead

item.title: Now with Comments!
item.description: For a blog you need comments. Like all those other jekyll themes we baked in Disqus. It’s easy to set, it works and makes a static jekyll blog more dynamic.

item.title: Play Audio & Video with mediaelement.js
item.description: Do you like music? Or are you a podcaster? Do you want to stream your videos in a nice player?

item.title: Wonderful Typography
item.description: Feeling Responsive uses Volkhov for headlines, Lato for everything else and if you are in need to show some code, it will be in Lucida Console or Monaco
